testcase.name: The finalSalary method returns the correct result when productsSold above threshold
finalSalary method returns correct result when daysSkipped below and productsSold above threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result capped at maximum salary
The finalSalary method returns the regular salary without multiplier and bonus
The finalSalary method returns the correct result getting closer to the maximum
finalSalary method returns correct result when daysSkipped above and productsSold below threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped below threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped and productsSold above threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped above threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when productsSold below threshold
The finalSalary method returns the correct result when daysSkipped and productsSold below threshold
